nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hello Person1, thank you and All for your help!   Person2 is having a tough day with pain MM/DD/YYYY; he's not in shape to get to the office. I am on the lookout for the permission / patient approval document that is being sent by the blood testing lab. I'll let you know as soon as that is completed. I would like to add one more Rx request: a new script for Lidocaine / Prilocaine cream, please. We are both at the limit of getting "stuck." Most appreciative!     One more bit of info for Dr. Person3: Dr. Person4 was speaking with Dr. Person5 (MSKCC) to see if there might be a clinical trial suitable for Person2.
